Definition: In this task, you're given a review from Amazon and a category of the product based on the review given by the user. Your task is to classify whether the given category matches the review. If the review and its category match, generate "True". Otherwise, generate "False".

I unpackaged the entire chair and hardware before noticing this. I will go so far as to include a picture of what their injection molding and quality assurance process missed though. I will be hesitant to buy again.  Category: furniture
